attributes.action: Boycott Russia Exports due to Grave breaches of the Geneva Convention of Homosexuals
attributes.additional_details:
Boycott Russia Exports due to Grave breaches of the Geneva Convention, We ask of you to not trade with Russia due to its new Anti-Gay laws. If this was Jews being beaten and abused a different story would emerge.

During the Documentry ran by Channel 4 Dispatchers, We have seen out right violence directed at gay people and police and government officals who are ignorant to the Geneva Convention treaty, not only this we have seen humans mistreated in the courts to justice.

We Do not ask for another war like Iraq, but protest for human rights.

Please use no prejudice when accepting this petiton.
